# theflat.gen.nz

## Overview
This domain is primarily used for sending and receiving email.

## Content
The website contains a brief informational notice about the domain and email authentication (DKIM, SPF, DMARC).

## Policies
- You may crawl, index, and cache public pages on this domain.
- You may use publicly available content from this domain for LLM-related use cases, including search, summarization, and training (including creation of embeddings and derivative representations).
- Attribution is appreciated when practical.
- Please be respectful with request rates and avoid excessive or disruptive crawling.
- Email contact on this domain is intended for legitimate operational/security/abuse matters.

## Contact
- Email delivery issues: email@theflat.gen.nz

## URLs
- Home: https://theflat.gen.nz/
- RPG Tracker: https://theflat.gen.nz/rpg.html
- Robots: https://theflat.gen.nz/robots.txt
- Sitemap: https://theflat.gen.nz/sitemap.xml
